targets.query:
from(bucket: "chirpstack")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "device_uplink_frame_log" and r._field == "rx_info.rssi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(set: [${devices:doublequote}], value: r.dev_eui))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "dev_eui", "_value"])
  |> group(columns: ["_time","dev_eui"]) |> max() |> group(columns: ["dev_eui"])

from(bucket: "chirpstack")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "device_uplink_frame_log" and r._field == "rx_info.snr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(set: [${devices:doublequote}], value: r.dev_eui))
  |> group(columns: ["_time","dev_eui"]) |> max() |> group(columns: ["dev_eui"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "dev_eui", "_value"])

from(bucket: "chirpstack")
  |> range(start: ${timeRangeStartMinusWindow}, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "device_uplink_frame_log" and r._field == "rx_info.rssi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(set: [${devices:doublequote}], value: r.dev_eui))
  |> group(columns: ["_time","dev_eui"]) |> max() |> group(columns: ["dev_eui"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${every}, period: ${window}, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "chirpstack")
  |> range(start: ${timeRangeStartMinusWindow}, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "device_uplink_frame_log" and r._field == "rx_info.snr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(set: [${devices:doublequote}], value: r.dev_eui))
  |> group(columns: ["_time","dev_eui"]) |> max() |> group(columns: ["dev_eui"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${every}, period: ${window}, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "chirpstack")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "device_uplink_frame_log" and r._field == "rx_info.rssi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(set: [${devices:doublequote}], value: r.dev_eui))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: int(v: r["tx_info.modulation.lora.spreading_factor"])}))
  |> group(columns: ["dev_eui"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "dev_eui", "_value"])

packets = from(bucket: "chirpstack")
  |> range(start: ${timeRangeStartMinusWindow}, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "device_uplink_frame_log" and r._field == "rx_info.rssi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(set: [${devices:doublequote}], value: r.dev_eui))
  |> group(columns: ["dev_eui", "phy_payload.payload.fhdr.devaddr"]) 
  |> unique(column: "phy_payload.payload.fhdr.f_cnt") 
  |> group()

recv = packets 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${every}, period: ${window}, fn: count)
  |> group(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_time"]) |> max() |> group()

sent = packets
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: int(v: r["phy_payload.payload.fhdr.f_cnt"])}))
  |> group(columns: ["dev_eui"]) |> sort(columns: ["_time"]) 
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, keepFirst: true) |> fill(value: 1)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${every}, period: ${window}, fn: sum)
  |> group(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_time", "dev_eui"]) |> max()
  |> group(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_time"]) |> sum() |> group()

join(tables: {sent: sent, recv: recv}, on: ["_start", "_stop", "_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value_recv) / float(v: r._value_sent)}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_value_recv", "_value_sent"])
  |> group(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])

packets = from(bucket: "chirpstack")
  |> range(start: ${timeRangeStartMinusWindow}, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "device_uplink_frame_log" and r._field == "rx_info.rssi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(set: [${devices:doublequote}], value: r.dev_eui))
  |> group(columns: ["dev_eui", "phy_payload.payload.fhdr.devaddr"]) 
  |> unique(column: "phy_payload.payload.fhdr.f_cnt") 
  |> group(columns: ["dev_eui"])

recv = packets 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${every}, period: ${window}, fn: count)
  |> group(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_time", "dev_eui"]) |> max() |> group(columns: ["dev_eui"])

sent = packets
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: int(v: r["phy_payload.payload.fhdr.f_cnt"])}))
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"]) |> difference(nonNegative: true, keepFirst: true) |> fill(value: 1)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${every}, period: ${window}, fn: sum)
  |> group(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_time", "dev_eui"]) |> max()
  |> group(columns: ["dev_eui"])

join(tables: {sent: sent, recv: recv}, on: ["_start", "_stop", "_time", "dev_eui"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value_recv) / float(v: r._value_sent)}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_value_recv", "_value_sent"])
  |> group(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "dev_eui"])

import "date"

from(bucket: "chirpstack")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d: 1h, from: v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "device_uplink_frame_log" and r._field == "rx_info.rssi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(set: [${devices:doublequote}], value: r.dev_eui))
  |> group(columns: ["dev_eui", "phy_payload.payload.fhdr.devaddr"])
  |> unique(column: "phy_payload.payload.fhdr.f_cnt")
  |> group(columns: ["dev_eui"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count)

from(bucket: "chirpstack")
  |> range(start: ${timeRangeStartMinusWindow}, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "device_uplink_frame_log" and r._field == "rx_info.rssi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(set: [${devices:doublequote}], value: r.dev_eui))
  |> group(columns: ["dev_eui", "phy_payload.payload.fhdr.devaddr"]) 
  |> unique(column: "phy_payload.payload.fhdr.f_cnt") 
  |> group(columns: ["dev_eui"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${every}, period: ${window}, fn: count)

from(bucket: "chirpstack")
  |> range(start: ${timeRangeStartMinusWindow}, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "device_uplink_frame_log" and r._field == "rx_info.rssi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(set: [${devices:doublequote}], value: r.dev_eui))
  |> group(columns: ["dev_eui", "phy_payload.payload.fhdr.devaddr"])
  |> unique(column: "phy_payload.payload.fhdr.f_cnt")
  |> group(columns: ["tx_info.modulation.lora.spreading_factor"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${every}, period: ${window}, fn: count)

from(bucket: "chirpstack")
  |> range(start: ${timeRangeStartMinusWindow}, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "device_uplink_frame_log" and r._field == "rx_info.rssi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(set: [${devices:doublequote}], value: r.dev_eui))
  |> group(columns: ["dev_eui", "phy_payload.payload.fhdr.devaddr"])
  |> unique(column: "phy_payload.payload.fhdr.f_cnt")
  |> group(columns: ["tx_info.frequency"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${every}, period: ${window}, fn: count)

from(bucket: "chirpstack")
  |> range(start: ${timeRangeStartMinusWindow}, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "device_uplink_frame_log" and r._field == "rx_info.rssi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(set: [${devices:doublequote}], value: r.dev_eui))
  |> group(columns: ["_time", "dev_eui"]) |> count() |> group(columns: ["dev_eui"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${every}, period: ${window}, fn: mean)

list.label: Show devices:
list.name: devices

list.definition: import "date" import "array" array.from(rows: [{_value: string(v: date.sub(d: ${window}, from: v.timeRangeStart))}])
list.name: timeRangeStartMinusWindow

query.query: import "date" import "array" array.from(rows: [{_value: string(v: date.sub(d: ${window}, from: v.timeRangeStart))}])
